Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of three lines of Coptic text, now faded to off-white.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394564) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394564)
